rawResults.name: MicrobatchCollector + Kafka (Batch Send)
rawResults.notes: Submitted: 176,138,223 events; Sent to Kafka: 165,624,965 events; Batches sent: 1,495; Avg batch size: 110785.9; Avg Kafka batch time: 6.531 ms; Kafka throughput: 16,504,730 events/sec; Best config: batch=30000000, interval=30000000Âµs
